comments.comments_text: It looks like Simon Francis (Bournemouth) saw red with that tackle. Stuart Attwell won't tolerate such behaviour on the pitch and blows for a foul.

comments.comments_text: What was Pablo Zabaleta (West Ham) thinking? He will not get away with that. The referee shows him a yellow card.
